current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
Amending Senate Resolution 400 (94th Congress) to clarify the responsibility of committees of the
			 Senate in the provision of the advice and consent of the Senate to
			 nominations to positions in the intelligence community.

sponsor.#tail: submitted the following resolution; which was ordered placed on the calendar

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
agreed to May 19, 1976 (94th Congress) is amended to read as
			 follows:
